## Description {#details}

An analysis pass which caches information about the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a>.

Records the function level information used by GCRoots. This pass depends on <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/collectormetadataanalysis">CollectorMetadataAnalysis</a></code>.

Definition at line 180 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/gcmetadata-h">GCMetadata.h</a>.
